column1: This too shall pass. When things fall apart there’s no need to lose your temper. Worth trying another approach?
column2: Fighting fire with fire is not always the best approach. Maybe you should rethink a more pleasant reply.

column1: Some words can be unpleasant for others hopefully it was not the case.
column2: Apparently something unpleasant came across hopefully nothing major.

column1: Perhaps fear is a great survival mechanism but sometimes it’s better to clear your mind and overcome it.
column2: You can’t think clearly when your mind is flooded with fear. Get over it!
column3: Don’t run away from your fears. Fight them!

column1: Glad to see you’re doing fine! Keep it that way!
column2: Nice to see a person who enjoys every single moment!

column1: Life is like a zebra. There are both black and white stripes on it. Never give up it’s such a wonderful life.
column2: Sometimes life turns its back on you… Good thing is – not for long.

column1: There’s a lot of rational thoughts in here. Also it’s alright to be emotional sometimes we are not robots right?
column2: A thoughtful and rational person can sometimes feel a bit emotionless… Hopefully it doesn’t apply to you.

column1: A lot of confidence in here. Well done!
column2: Great! Looks like you are certain in your abilities!
column3: Confidence is the key to success. Carry on!

column1: Not much confidence in here… A tentative person can be perceived as doubtful.
column2: Doubts are not always helpful. It’s time to become more confident!

column1: There’s nothing better than willingness to talk with others. Just make sure you know when you shouldn’t cross the line.
column2: Open minded people are always best to talk with. It looks like you are one of them!

column1: Very well! Desire of accomplishing your goals is quite rare nowadays.
column2: It appears that you are an efficient and organised person. Your words speak for themselves.

column1: A person’s thoughts tell a lot about their behaviour and it seems like you are an outgoing and social person.
column2: Your personality is what makes you yourself.

column1: Guess who gets along well with others? That’s right you! Cooperative people are always in demand.
